name: Anantara Mui Ne Resort & Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The resort is perfect and location is excellent. Food was amazing.. Sunset was beautiful... We got the Honeymoon Suite.. The room was huge... We love the balcony... Staff was very friendly.. worth for the price..
reviews.title: The Best Resort in Mui Ne

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013
reviews.text: We were fortunate enough to stay at the Mui Ne Anantara resort for the last 5 days of our honeymoon which consisted of touring Cambodia and Vietnam. We were welcomed right from the moment we stepped out of the car on to the forecourt and were made to feel equally welcomed and at ease the whole duration of our stay by the reception staff, the restaurant staff, the poolside team and the cleaning team. We felt well and truly spoilt and very much enjoyed the very thoughtful little touches like the floral display on our bed when we entered our apartment, the short stories of local folklore and messages of 'sweet dreams' written on leaves by the night service and the extras we got whilst relaxing by the pool like fruit kebabs, iced coffees and cold water. The quality of the room and the facilities was always faultless and catered for our every need. We would love to return one day. Maybe for our anniversary!
reviews.title: The perfect final stop to an awesome honeymoon!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I travel a lot and are often in 5* hotels around the world. I can say the the Anantara Mui Ne is one of the best hotels we have ever been. The "dream" starts when you arrive and when you get a warm welcome and ends with the day you get the transfer to the Airport (5 hours with this very friendly guy and the hotel-car feel like 1 hour!).
reviews.title: A Dream!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We have been there in low season, so there was plenty of space at the pool and the beach. We did not see one staff member that was unfriendly.
reviews.title: The dream vacation!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So when you come to Mui Ne, go tho the Antara!
reviews.title: Fantastic Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013
reviews.text: We are still here! In pool villa 525.
reviews.title: Loved it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are having a great time.certainly this hotel is the best in the area and one of the best really 5 star hotel i have stayed so far.
reviews.title: It's A Mixed Feeling

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: if you want to spend quality time in mui ne this is the place to be!
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Anantara is a very nice property. Though we were given the room that different than from what we ordered, they explained to us it is a similar one. And we choose not make hassle about it to ruin our trip because we had to wait for about 2hrs to have our room ready, since it was "just" 12pm.
reviews.title: Paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And after hours we checked in asked their help on internet connection and no one can really help, we just discovered that our room does not WI-FI router, which later they fixed.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed during May, just out of Season. Perfect for a chill out holiday, Senior management are Western so understand what the Western guest wants from a holiday. Mark the GM ensures genuine problems are swiftly resolved. We stayed in a villa, maybe not worth the additional expense if ’just passing through’ but for a longer relaxing stay brilliant. Its private garden and pool, late night skinny dips to cool down all justified the additional cost. One problem that does need a permanent solution is a lack of storage in the Villas, Mark arranged for a chest of drawers to be put in our room, result one happy wife therefore one happy me!
reviews.title: 5 Star Relaxation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The food was superb, maybe not worth the cost if B & B, (go half board). The new Exec Chief explained that all food is fresh every day, All the staff friendly and very attentive especially Grace the Restaurant Manager who found no request too much trouble.
reviews.title: Oasis of Calm..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Anantara Mui Ne is run by the Anantara Group, not owned and whilst it appears to still be a work in progress, it is defiantly getting there! The Hotel is near the end of ’the strip’ you can walk out of the hotel and have a large choice of shops and restaurants etc. on your doorstep. A definite 5 Star resort and some very happy memories of Vietnam.
reviews.title: Perfect holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After a busy and exciting 10 day tour travelling from North to South Vietnam, myself and my friend wanted nothing more then to relax, unwind and replenish ourselves after our travels...Anantara Resort & Spa exceeded our expectations!..On arrival, a complimentary shoulder and neck massage, followed by some refreshing herbal tea and a cold towel infused with lemongrass was complete Heaven!..our journey didn't stop there! The staff were just wonderful and catered to our every needs both by the pool and in the hotel. The Hotel room was superb and the fruit bowl and water each day were very welcomed. The food was exquisite at breakfast and dinner and the luxurious setting made Anantara truly magical at night! I would highly recommend the Spa center also. A 90 minute hot stone massage with delightful refreshments at the end was the perfect way to relax and feel rejuvenated! Thank you to all the staff at Anantara for a wonderfully magical and memorable 3 nights of complete luxury!
reviews.title: Relaxing holiday in a 5 star Hotel and location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Myself and my wife stayed at the Anantara at the beginning of May and we had a fantastic time.We arrived very late one night but there was still a manager there to meet us and settle us in.We stayed in 101 which we found to be perfect with it's own terrace and a great bed.
reviews.title: Has potential but falls short on service and food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel was above expectations. We had a deluxe room with ocean view, but next time I will probably prefer a pool villa. As much as I could see of these villa's they looked great especially the convenience of your own pool and a separate area with big table made it look great.
reviews.title: great escape

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Our deluxe room was also well equipped and nicely decorated: spacious bathroom with separate toilet, very big bath, separate working station and comfortable bed, and very big balcony. the room was the last room of the wing, so the balcony was extra big because of this.
reviews.title: Nice resort with excellent service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the breakfast is great, different stations with a wide array of on the spot prepared food like noodle soup, crepes, pancakes, eggs etc. big choice of fresh juice and the always very friendly staff nearby to help with any other requests.
reviews.title: End of trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For people coming from Ho Chi Minh I recommend them to make usage of the service of www.saigon2muine.com they can bring you from HCM to Mui Ne for 100$ in a private car.
reviews.title: Could have been so much better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is most definitely a recommendation!
reviews.title: First Class Hotel Service & Beach Location

aka: Anantara Mui Ne Hotel Mui Ne
description: Set on Mui Ne’s pristinely sweeping beach, Anantara Mui Ne Resort & Spa is an oasis of elegance and comfort offering a unique and unforgettable way to experience the southern coast of Vietnam. Mornings spent by the sea. Afternoon hikes through nearby sand dunes. A soothing spa treatment before starlit evening drinks on the beach.Expertly blending Vietnamese tradition and legendary Anantara service, Anantara Mui Ne Resort & Spa offers a tropical retreat, worlds away from Vietnam’s urban bustle. Take in the splendour of the sunset from the pool deck. Sample fine international dining and mouth-watering cuisine at our restaurants, some of the best Mui Ne resorts have to offer. Wander down garden paths to your own private villa. A cherished holiday within a setting to remember forever in our exceptional Vietnam hotel.
